abstract: Peter Campion reviews Adam Kirsch book Emblems of the Passing World: Poems After Photographs by August Sander.
lead_paragraph: Pairings of new verse with stark photographic portraits of Germans between the wars.

headline.main: ‘Emblems of the Passing World,’ by Adam Kirsch
headline.print_headline: A Conversation Across Time and Form
